synopsis.text: In the year 2040, Tokyo is rebuilding after a devastating earthquake, thanks largely to powerful mega-corporations like Genom that manufacture humanoid robots called "Boomers" to serve as a new labor class. However, Boomers occasionally malfunction and go on violent rampages beyond human control. A vigilante group known as the "Knight Sabers" has emerged to combat these rogue Boomers. Led by four brave women wearing advanced, form-fitting powered exoskeletons granting immense strength and agility, they wage a secret war against Genom and its out-of-control robotic creations. Though initially believed to be fighting for justice, there may be more to the Knight Sabers' motivations than meets the eye. As young Lina Yamazaki travels to future Tokyo seeking both employment and the chance to join the legendary Knight Sabers, she becomes embroiled in the growing conflict between mankind and machine. Will the Knight Sabers prevail in keeping the Boomer threat at bay, or are more sinister forces actually pulling the strings? The battle for Mega-Tokyo's future is about to begin...
